attributes.action: make it possible to vote against any petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: keeping count of the number of votes against a  petition would give a clearer view of public opinion when compared to the votes for a petition, giving a net positve or negative response

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
